title: used for:
content:
Form validation -  communicate to the browser, create cookies tostore and retrieve information on your computer

Offload a busy server, react to events even when the page isfinishing loading, including read and update the HTML content

var  is the keyword todeclare variables (local)example: var x;

Form validation: before passing on the user input to server

DOM (Document Object Model):a standard defines how to accessweb pages as documents

ex: document.getElementById(ID);
